title: Split Fiction
slogan: Experience the new Split Fiction adventure
description: Dive into the musical world of Split Fiction and unleash your creativity!

HomeFeatures.gameTitle: Split Fiction: A New Musical Journey
HomeFeatures.whatIsDescription: Split Fiction is a fan-modified game offering unique music-mixing with custom sounds and new characters. Join a world of beats, vocals, and melodies combined to create your tracks.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep1: Launch the Game: Access it online and get started.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep2: Select Sounds: Explore a variety of beats, effects, and vocals.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep3: Mix & Match: Drag sounds to characters and innovate your track.
HomeFeatures.feature1Description: Experience fresh and diverse musical styles that enhance gameplay.
HomeFeatures.feature2Description: Enjoy expanded creative freedom with special sounds and characters.
HomeFeatures.feature3Description: Play Split Fiction seamlessly on your mobile device.
HomeFeatures.feature4Description: Engage without limits - Split Fiction is completely free!
